name: Super Brenden Country
description:
Original Release Date: July 2015

Super Brenden Country was a side project created alongside my best friend, neighbor, and fellow epik gamur boi, Brenden. He's provided all sorts of ideas for games prior, but I deemed them "too crazy" to be made. So, I just let him loose for once and this three-world demo was the result. This masterpiece was made during the holy era for MLG and indie game memes, so you'll definitely spot a few references here and there.

I didn't finish it due to beginning work on "Alexander High", which would eventually be cancelled right before the end of my senior year. What an idiot I was.
